text.autoconfig.bettercombat.title: Better Combat
text.autoconfig.bettercombat.option.clie: Hold to attack
Automatically attack while holding the attack button
Attack instead of mining
Attack instead of mining upon left click, when enemies are close enough to strike
Mine with weapons
Allow mining with weapons
Swing through grass
Attack instead of mining zero hardness blocks with weapons
Highlight crosshair

Highlights the crosshair if enemies are close enough to strike.
WARNING! Enabling this might reduce frame rate significantly.
Highlight color
Color applied to HUD elements if needed.
Show arms in first person
Render arms for attack animations played in first person view
Show inactive hand in first person
Render hand you are not attacking with in first person view
Smooth animation transitions
Attack animations smoothly transition at the cost of accuracy
Item tooltip: show attack range
Show attack range attribute on weapon tooltips
Item tooltip: reformat vanilla range
Format Entity Interaction Range to Attack Range
Weapon swing sound volume %
Change volume of weapon swing sounds
Show sweeping
Enable showing sword sweeping particle effects
Swing thru grass blacklist
Weapons with an ID that matches this regex will never swing thru grass
Mine with weapon blacklist
Weapons with an ID that matches this regex will never be used to harvest blocks
Debug hitbox
Show weapon hitbox when entity hitboxes are displayed
First-person player animations
Attack player animations to be shown. Only recommended to change if custom camera mods in use.
Disable leg animations
EXPERIMENTAL: Disable leg animations while running over this speed
